name: BLT Pizza Appetizer
author: violet
summary: This is a wonderful and easy appetizer pizza that is always a hit at parties. Store in the refrigerator until serving.
ingredients: 1 pound bacon strips, cooked and chopped
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a cookie sheet with nonstick cooking spray
Unroll crescent rolls and pat onto the prepared pan
Let stand for 5 minutes; poke in several places using a fork
Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 10 minutes
Remove from the oven and let cool, at least 10 minutes
Beat mayonnaise, cream cheese, and garlic salt together using an electric mixer in a mixing bowl
Sprinkle bacon on top of cheese spread
Sprinkle tomatoes on top of bacon, followed by green onions
